    Style Modifiers

    Custom CSS

    Table View Modifiers

    Name Description
    responsive Enables flexbox row wrapping up to 6 columns
    flush Enables no padding
    tiny Enables tiny padding
    small Enables small padding
    large Enables large padding
    huge Enables huge padding
    inset Enables margin and border
    bare Removes all borders / background colors

    Modifier - Responsive Rows

    Modifier - Borders

    Modifier - Bare

    Modifier - Flush

    Modifier - Tiny

    Modifier - Small

    Modifier - Regular

    Modifier - Large

    Modifier - Huge

    Modifier - Inset

    Modifier - Responsive
